snippet: President Obama plans to propose tax incentives for companies to bring home manufacturing jobs they had moved overseas, and curtail tax breaks for those that keep relocating jobs abroad.
abstract: President Obama plans to propose tax incentives for companies to bring home manufacturing jobs they had moved overseas, and curtail tax breaks for those that keep relocating jobs abroad.
lead_paragraph: President Obama plans to propose tax incentives for companies to bring home manufacturing jobs they had moved overseas, and curtail tax breaks for those that keep relocating jobs abroad.

headline.seo: Obama Seeks Tax Breaks to Return Jobs From Abroad
headline.main: Obama Calls for Tax Breaks to Return Jobs From Abroad
headline.print_headline: Obama Calls for Tax Breaks To Return Jobs From Abroad
